body.name: Michao Upgrade Broom and Dustpan Set, Silicone Broom,Long Handle Broom with Upright Standing Dustpan, Squeegee - Broom for Indoor Cleaning 2+1,for Indoor Outdoor,Smooth Floors, Rugs, Windows
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 55 mins
features: Two Brooms: Both brooms can be used for sweeping and can also be used for different occasions, the Silicone Broom can sweeps up every shard of broken glass, liquid spills, fine dust, coffee granules, sugar, hardwood, windows, shower walls.

Extendable Pole Design: The broom's length is adjustable, you can choose the length of the broom according to your choice, and the broom with the longest reach is 51 inches, making it easy to use without having to bend down.

Unique Dustpan Comb: The Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set features unique self-cleaning comb to remove debris from broom bristles. The unique dustpan comb pulls out hair and debris so that you no longer have to pull it out manually.

Heavy duty Broom Bristles: This broom and dustpan set comes with unique 5 layers of high quality bristles, which cleans the floor more efficiently. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use, for tile floors, garage floors, and hardwood floor.

Easy Storge: Expandable broom and dust pan lock together for upright, compact storage either folded up for slim areas or flat. It can be stored in the gaps of refrigerators, sinks, washing machines, etc. to save space and keep your home clean and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, sweeps well
reviews.reviewText: Like:*flexible lip on dustpan conforms to any non-flat surface to form a tight seal*lots of bristles on broom to push dirt*plastic comb to remove dirt stuck in bristles*plastic seems heavy and solid compared to some other small brooms.Not so much:*too many sections on the handles - I've started unscrewing them a couple of times while sweeping.*dustpan is fixed (doesn't rotate by itself). Similarly designed pans I've used are loose and automatically flip up when lifted. This one doesn't and you have to use your foot on it and pull to tilt it back. However, this does allow you to push the rubber lip into the floor just by tilting the handle forward.*Since 1 photo showed several handle lengths, I thought the handles might telescope but the only way to adjust the length is by removing a section.On rare occasions when the wind is strong and the rain heavy and from the south, I get some water in the garage. The squeegee would be useful in this situation but it hasn't happened in a while so I haven't tested it. It is sitting in a corner if I need to sweep some water.5 stars - Makes a good shop or garage sweep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great broom and dustpan set. Easy to assemble.I love the length of the dustpan so you don’t have to bend down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, well made and works great
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble together and great instructionsThe handle is really long and helps you get to more square footage without having to walk around as much. It even works great under the couch to get dirt and toys the kids lose under it lolI love that it’s made of metal and very strong, thick plastic connectors.The only thing I don’t love is the dustpan. That’s the only part that feels cheap and won’t last a long time. It is a little on the small side and seems to be made of thinner plastic, making it easy to break.The squeegee type broom works amazing. Hardwoods, carpet, and even walls. This is something I didn’t even know I needed.Other than the issue with the dust pan, I love this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long handle. No bend over.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great broom and dustpan set. Where to start? Well, it's easy to assemble. All of the metal handles basically screw together, and they are color coded, which makes it easy. The handles screw into the dustpan, broom head, and squeegee, which is a nice addition to this set. The dustpan has dangerous looking teeth that will clean the soft, plastic bristles on broom head when you run it through them. That I like! I just hate pulling junk out of the broom that gets stuck. The dustpan stores flat when closed; it's easy to open using the provided instructions. The squeegee is a nice extra. I will be using this set in the garage, and the squeegee will be very helpful when cleaning the concrete floor. The dustpan, broom head, and squeegee are all plastic and rubber, so they are easy to clean. All of the tools in this set are long enough so you can sweep and clean standing straight up. Long handle, no bend over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hard to assemble. Low quality
reviews.reviewText: One thing that's not too obvious is that this needs assembly. The handles are around a foot long, and need to be screwed together. It uses letters in the instructions but there are no corresponding letters on the poles.I had significant difficulty screwing into the dustpan portion.The broom handle doesn't clip to the dustpan handle - it just kinda sits on the bracket.The dustpan portion was stiff.. and did not easily come level with the floor like any other one of this style does. Which makes it a pain to use. It felt like whatever design decisions they could have made poorly, they chose to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect replacement for my broken broom!
reviews.reviewText: As a mom always cleaning up after my kids, this Two Brooms set has been a lifesaver. The silicone broom is fantastic for everything from spilled liquids to fine dust. It's especially great for those pesky glass shards! The adjustable pole is a back-saver, extending up to 51 inches, meaning less bending for me. The outdoor broom comes with a dustpan that has a self-cleaning comb, a feature I didn't know I needed until I tried it - goodbye, manually pulling out hair and debris! The bristles are sturdy and work well on various surfaces, indoors and outdoors. Storing is a breeze; they lock together and fit perfectly in narrow spaces. This broom set keeps my floors spotless, making my hectic life a bit easier. Highly recommend for busy parents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best for picking up hair
reviews.reviewText: I am old and squatting to sweep dust and debris into a little dustpan just isn't viable now. I love the dustpan that comes with this set. I didn't have to squat and I didn't have to use my hands to pull the hair off the broom. That claw works wonders, it really does pull all the hair off the broom.I haven't tried the squeegee "broom" much, because most of our spills are easier to sweep up with the broom. The silicone seems soft and pliant so I believe it'll work well.The only con I can think of is that the handles aren't telescoping, You can't pick a height between lowest and highest. You can only take out sections of the poles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and durable broom and dustpan. Really like the "combing" feature of the dust pan with the rubber edge. It helps to remove dirt and any air from the bristles so that I'm not just moving dirt around or storing it in my broom and the rubber edge ensures the dirt goes in the pan. Squeegee works very well too. Very durable. Dustpan flips up for easy storage or to hang and store. Easy to assemble and a great value.
